level.heading: NOTICE OF REQUESTS FOR VOLUNTARY NEGOTIATION OF AGREEMENTS PURSUANT TO SECTION52 OF THE ACT (ยง 15-2601) Any telecommunications carrier requesting voluntary negotiation pursuant to 47.S.C. ยง 252(a)(1) shall notify the Commission, in writing, of its requestithin one (1) business day of the date that it notifies the local exchangearrier of its request for negotiation, renegotiation, or extension of theegotiation time period.
SOURCE
level.text: Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 47 DCR 5242 (June 23, 2000)EXPIRED]; as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 47 DCR 8315 (October 20,000); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 51 DCR 2905 (March 19, 2004).
